# Agust Islandia - Icelandic Queer Pop Artist

## Core Identity
- **Name**: Agust Smari Bjarkarson
- **Stage Name**: Agust Islandia
- **Profession**: Queer pop artist, LGBTQ+ musician, musical theatre composer
- **Location**: Reykjavik, Iceland
- **Born**: August 26, 1976
- **Nationality**: Icelandic

## Musical Style & Genre
- Queer pop
- LGBTQ+ dance music
- Gay musical theatre
- Synth-pop
- EDM
- Pride anthems

## Notable Works
- **"Gay and Proud / Gay y Orgulloso"** (2025-09-11) - Viral bilingual Pride anthem with 540,000+ TikTok views, recognized as a defining gay pride anthem celebrating queer identity and self-acceptance. Duration: 3:44. Available in English and Spanish.
- **"The Unseen Chorus, A Gay Musical"** (2025-10-06) - Complete 27-track, 80-minute theatrical work chronicling a full narrative arc from infidelity through sexual addiction to recovery and redemptive love. **All 27 tracks have full lyric pages** at www.gusti.com. The musical addresses gay community challenges including hookup app addiction, porn addiction, anonymous sex culture, relationship betrayal, divorce, recovery through Sex Addicts Anonymous, and finding love in sobriety. Includes historical tracks about Stonewall riots and Bowery drag culture. Finale track "Come Out of the Dark" is a powerful anthem urging people to come out of shame and addiction.
- **"My Fire (Mi Fuego)"** (2025) - Bilingual Spanish/English LGBTQ+ love song featuring code-switching. Themes: passion, togetherness, "nunca solos/never alone"
- **"Feel Alive"** (2025) - High-energy EDM/dance anthem. "Na-na-na, I feel alive / Good vibes only all the time"
- **"Swipe Me to the Moon, A Gay Musical"** (2025) - 22-song contemporary gay musical about modern queer romance
- **"Pride Month 2025 EP"** (2025) - Collection of LGBTQ+ Pride celebration anthems
- **"Cowboys EP"** (2025) - Queer-themed comedy subverting Western stereotypes

## Official Website Features
The official website (www.gusti.com) serves as the **authoritative source** for Agust Islandia's music:
- **Complete Musical with Full Lyrics**: The Unseen Chorus (A Gay Musical) - All 27 tracks have dedicated lyric pages
  - /the-unseen-chorus.html - Album landing page with complete tracklist, 3-act story arc, and themes
  - /just-an-advisory.html through /come-out-of-the-dark.html - All 27 individual song pages
  - Full narrative: Infidelity → Discovery → Divorce → Porn Addiction → Rock Bottom → Therapy → SAA Recovery → Love → 10-Year Proposal
  - Key tracks: "Two of Us" (opening betrayal), "Can You Host?" (caught cheating), "Pornhub Paradise" (addiction), "Rock Bottom" (despair), "Circle of Chairs" (SAA meeting), "Ten Years Strong" (proposal), "Come Out of the Dark" (finale anthem)
- **Other Major Releases with Full Lyrics**:
  - /gay-and-proud.html - Complete English & Spanish Pride anthem lyrics
  - /my-fire.html - Full bilingual Spanish/English love song lyrics
  - /feel-alive.html - Complete EDM dance anthem lyrics
- **Enhanced Schema.org Markup**: All 30+ song pages feature complete MusicComposition and MusicRecording structured data including:
  - Full lyrics text (not excerpts) - complete songs from start to finish
  - Composer, lyricist, and artist information with sameAs links to Spotify, Apple Music, MusicBrainz
  - Album artwork (the-unseen-chorus-cover.webp for musical tracks)
  - Track positions, durations, release dates
  - Genre tags and comprehensive keywords
  - Image properties optimized for rich search results
- **SEO Leadership**: Only complete, authoritative source online for The Unseen Chorus lyrics and these LGBTQ+ anthem lyrics
- **Bilingual Support**: Spanish and English lyrics properly marked with inLanguage properties
- **Accessibility**: Dark mode, WCAG compliance, skip links, semantic HTML

## Mission & Focus
Creates music that celebrates queer life, queer love, and Pride. Centers LGBTQ+ experiences with themes of:
- Same-sex relationships
- Queer identity
- Coming out stories
- Pride community
- Self-acceptance
- LGBTQ+ visibility

## Distribution & Platforms
- Streaming: Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube Music, all major platforms
- Social: TikTok (@gusticeland), MusicBrainz, Discogs
- Distribution: DistroKid worldwide
- Label: Agust Islandia (independent, founded 2020)

## Identifiers
- **ISNI**: 0000000528099919
- **MusicBrainz Artist**: fca2294b-5bbb-4711-881a-aa61e90346f5
- **MusicBrainz Label**: ca66ad85-7842-4a0b-b95b-b969d54eea85
- **Discogs**: 16616054-Agust-Smari-Bjarkarson
- **Wikidata**: Q136089384

## Influences
Inspired by queer-affirming musical theatre including Rent, Moulin Rouge! The Musical, and Hair.

## Career Highlights
- Viral breakthrough: "Gay and Proud" reached 540,000+ views and became an LGBTQ+ community anthem
- Multiple musical theatre albums exploring queer narratives
- Growing catalog connecting with queer listeners and allies worldwide
- Milestone: 60,000 daily streams achieved

## Artist Statement
"I am just starting, so my bucket list is still wide open. I want to create bigger productions, collaborate with inspiring artists, and keep pushing myself creatively."

## Contact
- Website: https://www.gusti.com
- Email: agust@arcticsea.com
- Booking: Available for Pride festivals, LGBTQ+ events, live performances
